title: Rear Brake Pads - Inspection

body.body: Rear Brake Pad Inspection - DA2; DB; DB2; DBX; DC; DC3; DD2; DE; DE2; DEX; DF; DF2; DP; DP2; DP3; DPA; DT3; DU; DU3; DUX; DUY; DZ; DZA

Check the friction material of each brake pad for signs of contamination and measure its thickness. If the friction material of either pad is contaminated or has worn beyond the service limit, renew both pads as a set.
Check the anti-rattle spring and retaining pins. Renew any component which shows signs of damage or corrosion.
Check the caliper body slides easily on the mounting bracket pins and check there is no sign of leakage from the piston seals. Rectify any problems before installing the brake pads.
